item.title: A (section) of a map of the data engineering space
item.description: The map and problem described here were part of my presentation Mapping as a tool for thought, and mentioned in my interview with John Grant and Ben Mosior (to appear sometime soon in the Wardley Maps community youtube channel). Iâ€™m looking for ideas on how to make this map easier to understand and useful, so I posted it to the Wardley Maps Community forums requesting comments.

item.title: 2019#13 Readings of the week
item.description: Functional programming, adtech, history. Expect a similar wide range in the future as well. You can check all my weekly readings by checking the tag here . You can also get these as a weekly newsletter by subscribing here.
